mapper.select: select username, folder, thumbnail, price, count(1) as qty, sum(price) as amount from "order" where username = #{username} and folder = #{folder} and charged = true group by username, folder, thumbnail, price order by qty desc, amount desc
mapper.insert: insert into "order" ("number", email, username, folder, thumbnail, original, filename, price, createdt, charged, expiredt) values (#{number}, #{email}, #{username}, #{folder}, #{thumbnail}, #{original}, #{filename}, #{price}, #{createdt}, #{charged}, #{expiredt})
